rows.label: xs03040100_MSG0001
rows.name:
So much for the diplomatic approach.
What's the deal with wanting us all dead, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03040100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yeah, I wonder.
They did mention they were following orders...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03040100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Maybe someone higher up their chain of command
would be willing to negotiate.[ST:wait ]
